packageIntro:
bloodless

!Build Status

Bloodless is a server-side, metadata driven microframework for Dart.

How does it work?

Bloodless allows you to easily publish your functions and classes through a web interface, by just adding some annotations to them. 


import 'package:bloodless/server.dart' as app;

@app.Route("/")
helloWorld() => "Hello, World!";

main() {
  app.setupConsoleLog();
  app.start();
}

Want to know more?

Check out our wiki! :)
